abstract: Community Service Society of New York, one of seven charities supported by The New York Times Neediest Cases Fund, helps recovering addict Eric Gonzalez of Brooklyn get a job and pays for his daily transportation.
lead_paragraph: Eric Gonzalez sold and took drugs until a friend’s fatal shooting over drug turf compelled him to seek treatment. Now he’s trying to keep his family on the right path.

headline.main: A Janitor, Once an Addict, Cleans Up His Life
headline.print_headline: Once a Drug Addict, a Janitor in Harlem Seeks a Fresh Start

snippet: Eric Gonzalez sold and took drugs until a friend’s fatal shooting over drug turf compelled him to seek treatment. Now he’s trying to keep his family on the right path.
